origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.fetch_news', 'description': 'This function retrieves news articles about a specific cryptocurrency within a specified time frame and source.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'crypto_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency.'}, {'name': 'time_frame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the news, e.g., weekly, monthly.'}, {'name': 'source', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The source of the news, e.g., international, local.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'news_articles', 'description': 'A list of news articles related to the cryptocurrency.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.fetch_news, 它的参数输入如下: 'crypto_name'是'Ripple', 'time_frame'是'weekly', 'source'是'international'.
